Valve makes a lot of money with this game and does not invest back into the game, the game is filled with cheaters, the more you advance in ranked play, the more cheaters you will find, even at competitive level there are cheaters, also bugs too, spectator bug is around for years and Valve did nothing, Valve just keeps creating skins to sell and make profit with community market without investing back into the game.

This will only change when the community heavily migrates to another game and Valve realizes that they are losing their cash cow...
